item.title: PingCAP Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: PingCAP Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsOctober 22, 2024PingCAP (US), Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities in the following PingCAP maintained products and components: TiDB (code available athttps://github.com/pingcap/tidb); TiKV (code available athttps://github.com/tikv/tikv); PD (Placement Driver, code available athttps://github.com/tikv/pd); TiFlash (code available athttps://github.com/pingcap/tiflash); and tidbcloud (PingCAP’s cloud database service). This scope includes vulnerabilities in all supported versions of these products. CVE IDs will not be assigned for vulnerabilities found in unsupported versions or for third-party dependencies not maintained by PingCAP.

item.title: OMRON Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: OMRON Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsOctober 22, 2024OMRON Corporationis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Omron Group companies’ Industrial Automation, Healthcare, Social Systems, Device & Module Solutions issues only. Read the OMRON news release: “Authorized as a CVE Numbering Authority for security vulnerabilities.

item.title: Cyber Security Agency of Singapore Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Cyber Security Agency of Singapore Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsOctober 22, 2024Cyber Security Agency of Singapore(CSA) is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities reported to CSA unless covered by the scope of another CNA.

item.title: CVE Program Celebrates 25 Years of Impact!
item.description: CVE Program Celebrates 25 Years of Impact!blogBy CVE Program|October 22, 2024Today, theCommon Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE®) Programproudly commemorates its25th anniversary, marking a quarter-century of enabling coordinated vulnerability management through global collaboration and innovation. Launched in 1999, the CVE Program has transformed the way organizations identify and manage cybersecurity vulnerabilities, enabling stronger defenses against cyber threats. TheCVE 25th Anniversary Reportis available now on the CVE.ORG website.

item.title: NIST CVE Board Liaison Board Member Announced
item.description: NIST CVE Board Liaison Board Member AnnouncednewsOctober 29, 2024TheCVE Programis pleased to announce that Chris Turner of theNational Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)is the newest member of theCVE Board, serving as the “NIST CVE Board Liaison.”

item.title: Leica Biosystems Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Leica Biosystems Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsOctober 29, 2024Leica Biosystemsis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for all Leica Biosystems products.

item.title: CVE Program Report for Quarter 3 Calendar Year (Q3 CY) 2024
item.description: CVE Program Report for Quarter 3 Calendar Year (Q3 CY) 2024blogBy CVE Program|November 5, 2024The CVE Program’s quarterly summary of program milestones and metrics for Q3 CY 2024.

item.title: Chris Turner of NIST Joins the CVE Board as the “NIST CVE Board Liaison”
item.description: Chris Turner of NIST Joins the CVE Board as the “NIST CVE Board Liaison”blogBy CVE Program|November 5, 2024TheCVE Programis pleased to announce that Chris Turner of theNational Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)is the newest member of theCVE Board, serving as the “NIST CVE Board Liaison.”

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 222 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for November 4, 2024
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 222 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for November 4, 2024blogBy CVE Program|November 5, 2024The “CNA Enrichment Recognition List” for November 4, 2024, is now available with 222 CNAs listed. Published every two weeks on the CVE website, the list recognizes thoseCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)that are actively providing enhanced vulnerability data in theirCVE Records. CNAs are added to the list if they provideCommon Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS)andCommon Weakness Enumeration (CWE™)information 98% of the time or more within the two-week period of their last published CVE Record.

item.title: Neo4j Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Neo4j Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsNovember 5, 2024Neo4jis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Neo4j products and Neo4j-maintained projects only, not including end-of-life components or products.
